isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - ENGINE COVER

svcsubproc.title: Remove Engine Cover on Daycab and Sleeper Cab

step1.para:
Remove passenger air bucket seat or fixed passenger seat, and driver air bucket seat on daycab, refer to
SEATS
. For removing passenger air bucket seat, refer to Remove Passenger Air Bucket Seat on Daycab. For removing fixed passenger seat, refer to Remove Fixed Passenger Seat on Daycab. For removing driver air bucket seat, refer to Remove Driver Air Bucket Seat on Daycab.

Remove passenger air bucket seat or fixed passenger seat, and driver air bucket seat on sleeper cab, refer to
SEATS
. For removing passenger air bucket seat, refer to Remove Passenger Air Bucket Seat on Sleeper Cab. For removing fixed passenger seat, refer to Remove Fixed Passenger Seat on Sleeper Cab. For removing driver air bucket seat, refer to Remove Driver Air Bucket Seat on Sleeper Cab.

Remove passenger and driver side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover, refer to
CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER
.
Remove floor mat from daycab or front floor mat from sleeper cab. Lay out of the way and save for installation.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 96 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove two hex head sems bolts (Item 1) at the top of engine cover (Item 2). Lay them out of the way and save for installation.
Remove two hex head sems bolts (Item 3) from driver side of engine cover. Lay them out of the way and save for installation.
Remove two hex head sems bolts (Item 4) across the front of engine cover. Lay them out of the way and save for installation.
Remove two hex head sems bolts (Item 5) from passenger side of engine cover. Lay it out of the way and save for installation.
Slide engine cover (Item 2) out from under the dash panel. Lay it out of the way and save for installation.

figure.caption: Figure 96. Engine Cover on Daycab and Sleeper Cab

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX HEAD SEMS BOLT (M6 35 MM LONG)
3. HEX HEAD SEMS BOLT (M6 35 MM LONG)
4. HEX HEAD SEMS BOLT (M6 35 MM LONG)
5. HEX HEAD SEMS BOLT (M6 35 MM LONG)
